title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 435.9 - Casework contacts
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 435.9 - Casework contacts

State Regulations
(a) The social services district or the
voluntary agency supervising an approved respite care and services provider
must maintain weekly contact with the approved respite care and services
provider whenever children or foster children are receiving respite care and
services from the provider. Contact with the respite care and services provider
may take place in the home or other place where the provider is providing such
service or may be made by telephone. (b) Casework contacts appropriate for the
provision of preventive services or foster care services to any children and
families in receipt of such services must also be maintained in accordance with
the provisions of sections
423.4
(c)(1)(ii)
(
d
)(
1
) and 441.21 of this Title. Notes

435.9

New

York State Register December 23, 2015/Volume XXXVII, Issue 51, eff. 12/23/2015

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
